sessionLog.summary: Implemented roaring bitmap tag index for 100M+ scale, integrated CRoaring via FetchContent, fixed segment iteration, added BlobStore for payloads/edges, added ConnectionPool checksum and best-fit allocator.

Fixed SlotTagIndex::create() to write file immediately (was in-memory only), enabling UnifiedIndex snapshot to copy .tags file. All tests pass. WAL edge delta test was not actually broken - was stale test file issue.
